page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Farming used to be the main occupation of the families living in this area, but now that fewer people are needed to work the farms, there are many different occupations. However people have to travel quite long distances to their work in many cases. Apart from farming, there are few opportunities for employment in Resolis parish. There is H.D.Fraser's Haulage and Contracting buisness which employs about 10 men as drivers. There is also a busy joiners workshop, J.Munro's, which has been a family business passing from father to son for more than a hundred years. This employs some half dozen men, and as is usual up here, is also the local undertakers. Another family business is Leslie Smith's, who true to his name is the local blacksmith, contd page 15
